page.title: 16ANGEL INN STORY
page.content: Mr. Alec Chater took our class around the village he showed us the" Angel Inn". Soon after that day Mr. Chater wrote a story about the Inn here is a excerpt from his story.Beth happened to knock against a man as she busied herself seeing to the wants of the new arrivals." FOOLISH GIRL!" He exclaimed,as he aimed a fist at her.The blow was well-aimed,and sent Beth reeling into a group of drinkers,who merely shoved her away without a second thought.Only the mysterious figure seemed to notice this incident.As if on a slowly moving chain, his head raised,and eyes,first in deep shadow,became pulsating slits of light.The upward movement of the head was followed by the whole body becoming erect:a body that towered above everyone else.
